plot: From Northdale, Florida comes a story of survival, a story about a mime who ends up with stolen money which he did not steal. He must find a way out of the mess he is in, which includes dodging the local police...but can he do it in time?
title: The Mime
plot_es: From Northdale, Florida comes a story of survival, a story about a mime who ends up with stolen money which he did not steal. He must find a way out of the mess he is in, which includes dodging the local police...but can he do it in time?
plot_en: From Northdale, Florida comes a story of survival, a story about a mime who ends up with stolen money which he did not steal. He must find a way out of the mess he is in, which includes dodging the local police...but can he do it in time?
